attributes.action: Allow fans at the National League play off final on Sunday 2nd August.
attributes.background: Allow fans to attend the National League play off final at Wembley stadium on Sunday 2nd August.

rejection.details:
The Government has set general policies for spectators at sporting events, but does not consider events individually. Last month the Government announced plans for return of spectators to elite sports events, which you can read about here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/pilots-announced-for-return-of-spectators-to-elite-sports-events

You might like to sign the following petition, calling on the Government to allow sports venues to operate without COVID-19 restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325071
